# isNaN

**Instance Property**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the primitive contains any NaN values.

## Declaration

```swift
var isNaN: Bool { get }
```

## Instance properties

- **isFinite**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the primitive is infinite.
- **isZero**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the primitive is zero.

items.description: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the primitive is infinite.

items.description: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the primitive is zero.
